DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study learn pregnancy outcome osteogenesis imperfecta ( OI ) . Patients enrol Brittle Bone Disorders ( BBD ) Contact Registry ( CR ) invite via email participate study .
DOC.detailed_description: Population : The RDCRN BBD Contact Registry help researcher identify recruit patient eligible participation future research study . People eligible enrollment RDCRN BBD Contact Registry include patient parent patient Brittle Bone Disorders . All patient BBD United States around world encourage join . Survey Administration : The investigator administer review pregnancy outcomes survey delineate outcome pregnancy complicate vary form OI . Patients send email invitation describe study . If participant want participate eligible , follow survey link email message , direct IRB-approved online consent form . A unique survey link generate participant include survey invitation , customize email message . This link allow investigator determine complete survey . The investigator send repeat email invitation every two month ( total 3 invitation ) invite yet participate . The investigator allow approximately 6 month enrollment survey completion expect study close soon thereafter . Data : The survey data collect stored Rare Diseases Clinical Research Network 's Data Management Coordinating Center ( DMCC ) University South Florida . All data collect sent database Genotypes Phenotypes ( dbGaP ) store indefinitely .
